name: Chrome OS Crostini Backup
summary: A TINI file is a backup of a Linux environment created in Crostini, a Chrome OS app that allows users to run Linux in Chrome. It contains a copy of all the data saved within a user's Crostini environment. TINI files are gzipped TAR files, so they can be opened in other operating systems using any .TGZ or .TAR.GZ decompression utility.
